017package org.apache.juneau.rest.processor;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.http.HttpHeaders.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022
023import org.apache.http.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
025
026/**
027 * Response handler for {@link HttpEntity} objects.
028 *
029 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
030 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/ResponseProcessors">Response Processors</a>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033public class HttpEntityProcessor implements ResponseProcessor {
034
035   @Override /* ResponseProcessor */
036   public int process(RestOpSession opSession) throws IOException {
037
038      RestResponse res = opSession.getResponse();
039      HttpEntity e = res.getContent(HttpEntity.class);
040
041      if (e == null)
042         return NEXT;
043
044      res.setHeader(e.getContentType());
045      res.setHeader(e.getContentEncoding());
046      long contentLength = e.getContentLength();
047      if (contentLength >= 0)
048         res.setHeader(contentLength(contentLength));
049
050      try (OutputStream os = res.getNegotiatedOutputStream()) {
051         e.writeTo(os);
052         os.flush();
053      }
054
055      return FINISHED;
056   }
057}
